name: UpdateDeployedDevicesDevice
description: Update the given properties of a specific Device in the Fleet, giving it a friendly name, assigning to a Deployment, or a human identity.

Sid.description: Provides a 34 character string that uniquely identifies the requested Device resource.

DeploymentSid.description: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Deployment group that this Device is going to be associated with.

FriendlyName.description: Provides a human readable descriptive text to be assigned to this Device, up to 256 characters long.

Identity.description: Provides an arbitrary string identifier representing a human user to be associated with this Device, up to 256 characters long.

$ul: **account_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Account responsible for this Device.
**date_authenticated**: Specifies the date this Device was last authenticated, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**date_created**: Specifies the date this Device was created, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**date_updated**: Specifies the date this Device was last updated, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**deployment_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Deployment group that this Device is associated with.
**enabled**: Contains a boolean flag indicating whether the device is enabled or not, blocks device connectivity if set to false.
**fleet_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Fleet that the given Device belongs to.
**friendly_name**: Contains a human readable descriptive text for this Device, up to 256 characters long
**identity**: Contains an arbitrary string identifier representing a human user associated with this Device, assigned by the developer, up to 256 characters long.
**sid**: Contains a 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Device resource.
**unique_name**: Contains a unique and addressable name of this Device, assigned by the developer, up to 128 characters long.
**url**: Contains an absolute URL for this Device resource.
